uint8_t rf_802_15_4_pib_t::mac_options
 

Bit mask for: MAC_ASSOCPERMIT=0x01, MAC_ASSOC_CORD=0x02,MAC_BATT_LIFE_EXT=0x04, MAC_RX_ON_WHEN_IDLE=0x08, MAC_PROMISCOUS_MODE=0x10,MAC_GTS_PERMIT=0x20, MAC_SUPPORT_SHORT_ADDR=0x40
